errors.generic_command_execution_failed: There was an error while executing this command! =(
errors.command_not_found: I don't seem to know the command '%s' :/
errors.channel_not_found: This channel does not exist on this server. Did you spell it correctly?
errors.not_a_number: That was not a number! You didn't fail, but I didn't count that.
errors.invalid_arithmetic: That was not a valid arithmetic expression! You didn't fail, but I didn't count that.
errors.same_user: You can't count twice in a row. Wait for someone else to count.
errors.no_top_stats: There are no stats yet. Count to get on the leaderboard!

replies.bot_info_tagline: Discord Bot for counting. Allows arithmetic expressions.
replies.incorrect_number: That was not the next number! You failed! Last number was: %s and the next number would have been: %s. Your number was: %s
replies.timeout_set: Timeout has been set to %s minutes!
replies.timeout: You received a timeout for %s minutes!

reset_guild.are_you_sure: Are you sure you want to reset the current cound and all user stats?
